Name: inclusion-cell disease
Definition: A Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease that is characterized by optic atrophy followed by retinitis pigmentosa.

Name: pseudo-Hurler polydystrophy
Definition: A Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease that is characterized by optic atrophy followed by retinitis pigmentosa.

Name: mucolipidosis type IV
Definition: A mucolipidosis that is characterized by delayed development and vision impairment that worsens over time.

Name: glycoproteinosis
Definition: A mucolipidosis that is characterized by a deficiency of the enzyme alpha-N -acetyl neuraminidase (sialidase).
